HomeWiki:
Project Description
The project is a basic calculator control developed in Silverlight 5, feel free to include in your projects.

However CODE is AS/IS without any guarantee and warantee . use at your own risk(Source code included.

Usage Summary
Just Include ucCalculator.xaml file in your project and use this control as usercontrol any where around your projects.

Version 1.0.0.2: Released 13-March-2012
Changes
* added functionality of Squre-root, Power
* Now added Cumulative inputs support, earlier it limited to one operation only
* Different colored button for different functionality.



First Version


Additional Notes
the code is written in c# with silverlight 5 as frontend. you can use this silverlight control in your project. if you find any defect or bug feel free to report it.
